title: Wild Bee Ecology Exploration: Gamification-Based Integrated Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Integrated Educational Approach Combining Ecological Roles of Wild Bees and Mathematical Concepts for Current Elementary School Teachers

learning_goals: Learners improve data interpretation skills by graphically representing population changes of wild bees in a VR simulation.
Learners can explain ecosystem balance through mathematical modeling via gamification activities.

By the end of a 1-week short course, learners optimize ≥3 resource allocation problems using linear programming (LP) or integer programming (IP) in a given multi-layered simulation environment (e.g., factory resource allocation scenario) and propose solutions achieving ≥20% improvement in the objective function.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
